mapper.insert: INSERT INTO space(SPACE_NO, SPACE_NM, SPACE_MAX_PSON_CNT, SPACE_LOC_DESC, SPACE_ADTN_DESC, SPACE_MAX_RSVD_TMS, SPACE_USG_POSBL_BGN_TM, SPACE_USG_POSBL_END_TM, SPACE_WKEND_USG_POSBL_YN, SPACE_HIDE_YN, FST_REGR_IDNF_NO, LAST_UPDR_IDNF_NO) VALUES (#{spaceNo},#{spaceNm},#{spaceMaxPsonCnt}, #{spaceLocDesc}, #{spaceAdtnDesc}, #{spaceMaxRsvdTms}, #{spaceUsgPosblBgnTm}, #{spaceUsgPosblEndTm}, #{spaceWkendUsgPosblYn}, #{spaceHideYn}, #{fstRegrIdnfNo}, #{fstRegrIdnfNo})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM space WHERE SPACE_HIDE_YN = 'N'

SELECT s.SPACE_NO, s.SPACE_NM, s.SPACE_MAX_PSON_CNT, s.SPACE_LOC_DESC, s.SPACE_ADTN_DESC, s.SPACE_MAX_RSVD_TMS, s.SPACE_USG_POSBL_BGN_TM, s.SPACE_USG_POSBL_END_TM, s.SPACE_WKEND_USG_POSBL_YN, s.SPACE_HIDE_YN, f.FILE_NO, f.FILE_NM, f.FILE_ORGL_NM, f.FILE_TYP_NM, f.FILE_SIZE, r.RESC_NO, r.RESC_NM FROM ( SELECT * FROM space
WHERE SPACE_HIDE_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY FST_REG_DTM DESC LIMIT #{spaceCnt} OFFSET #{offset} ) s LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SPACE_NO, RESC_NO FROM ( SELECT SPACE_NO, RESC_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY SPACE_NO) AS rn FROM space_resc) sub WHERE rn <= #{rescCnt} ) sr ON sr.SPACE_NO = s.SPACE_NO LEFT JOIN resc r ON r.RESC_NO = sr.RESC_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FILE_NO, ATCH_LOC_NO, FILE_NM, FILE_ORGL_NM, FILE_TYP_NM, FILE_SIZE FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ATCH_LOC_NO ORDER BY FILE_NO) AS rn FROM file f WHERE f.ATCH_LOC_CD = #{atchLocCd}) sub WHERE rn = 1 ) f ON s.SPACE_NO = f.ATCH_LOC_NO ORDER BY s.FST_REG_DTM DESC, SPACE_NO

SELECT s.SPACE_NO, s.SPACE_NM, s.SPACE_MAX_PSON_CNT, s.SPACE_LOC_DESC, s.SPACE_ADTN_DESC , s.SPACE_MAX_RSVD_TMS, s.SPACE_USG_POSBL_BGN_TM, s.SPACE_USG_POSBL_END_TM, s.SPACE_WKEND_USG_POSBL_YN , s.SPACE_HIDE_YN, f.FILE_NO, f.FILE_NM, f.FILE_ORGL_NM, f.FILE_TYP_NM, f.FILE_SIZE, r.RESC_NO, r.RESC_NM , sb.SPACE_BOOK_ID, sb.SPACE_BOOK_DATE, sb.SPACE_BOOK_BGN_TM, sb.SPACE_BOOK_END_TM, sb.SPACE_BOOK_STUS_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM space
WHERE SPACE_HIDE_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY FST_REG_DTM DESC LIMIT #{spaceCnt} OFFSET #{offset} ) s LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SPACE_NO, RESC_NO FROM ( SELECT SPACE_NO, RESC_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY SPACE_NO) AS rn FROM space_resc) sub WHERE rn <= #{rescCnt} ) sr ON sr.SPACE_NO = s.SPACE_NO LEFT JOIN resc r ON r.RESC_NO = sr.RESC_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FILE_NO, ATCH_LOC_NO, FILE_NM, FILE_ORGL_NM, FILE_TYP_NM, FILE_SIZE FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ATCH_LOC_NO ORDER BY FILE_NO) AS rn FROM file f WHERE f.ATCH_LOC_CD = #{atchLocCd}) sub WHERE rn = 1 ) f ON s.SPACE_NO = f.ATCH_LOC_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM space_book WHERE SPACE_BOOK_STUS_CD = #{spaceBookStusCd} AND SPACE_BOOK_DATE = #{spaceBookDate} ) sb ON s.SPACE_NO = sb.SPACE_BOOK_SPACE_NO ORDER BY s.FST_REG_DTM DESC, SPACE_NO
